-MSbz99qxklK-5rZWGmt.title: How to design better logos
-MSbz99qxklK-5rZWGmt.text: The ultimate guide to designing the best logos!
-MSbz99qxklK-5rZWGmt.description: A logo is a visual representation of your brand, so why tell people what you do if you could just show them? Use simple icons to communicate who you are.Remember the brand vibe we talked about earlier? The use of the plane and the sun here makes me feel excited and reminds me of warm sunny holidays.Visual puns are a designer’s best friend too – here Frost Bites have created a quirky ‘bite’ to show that they are a food company. This is really easily achieved by overlapping two circles that are the same color as the background.

-MSc-8DwUmBi8NG52eOH.title: Design use white spaces correctly
-MSc-8DwUmBi8NG52eOH.text: A better overview on good practices on how to use white spaces
-MSc-8DwUmBi8NG52eOH.description: Using white space evenly makes the content in design easily scannable and significantly improves legibility. A study conducted indicates that proper use of white space between lines of paragraphs and its left and right margins can increase comprehension up to 20%.

-MSgyY8fK5DetuiWvbbX.title: How to style your site for 2022
-MSgyY8fK5DetuiWvbbX.text: View the all new styles for your site!
-MSgyY8fK5DetuiWvbbX.description: Sometimes the most effective site is the least complex one. One-page sites work best when their subject matter is narrower, like a portfolio or the presentation of a single idea. These sites evoke the feeling of holding a flyer or reading a poster. All the information you need to review is in one place without the distraction of navigation or searching multiple pages. It lets its subject be the focus of attention. This makes it more likely that a casual viewer will read the entire resume since everything they need is right up front.

-MSgyo88wO16izQZCVjh.title: Tips for naming your rebranded company
-MSgyo88wO16izQZCVjh.text: Hot tips for the re-branding of your company!
-MSgyo88wO16izQZCVjh.description: Leaders set objectives for a rebrand and brand name and then evaluate name options by the extent to which they fulfill the preset objectives. Find a name that explains what you are about. It makes everything clear and simple, and it helps sellers when they are first connecting.
